scripts.init:dve:core: cd ./divinevoxel/core ; npm run build ; cd ../../ ; npm init -y --scope @divinevoxel -w ./divinevoxel/core/dist

scripts.init:dve:magic: cd ./divinevoxel/magic ; npm run build ; cd ../../ ; npm init -y --scope @divinevoxel -w ./divinevoxel/magic/dist
scripts.init:dve:quantum-renderer: cd ./divinevoxel/quantum-renderer ; npm run build ; cd ../../ ; npm init -y --scope @divinevoxel -w ./divinevoxel/quantum-renderer/dist
scripts.init:dve:babylon-renderer: cd ./divinevoxel/babylon-renderer ; npm run build ; cd ../../ ; npm init -y --scope @divinevoxel -w ./divinevoxel/babylon-renderer/dist
